bibdata.title: IEEE Approved Draft Recommended Practice for Encryption and Management of Electronic Design Intellectual Property (IP)
Corrigendum 1: Correction to Rights Digest Description
IEEE Approved Draft Recommended Practice for Encryption and Management of Electronic Design Intellectual Property (IP) - Corrigendum 1: Correction to Rights Digest Description

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Correct an inconsistency within 7.4.3 of IEEE Std 1735-2014. The section contains a description of a rights digest followed by details on how to calculate it. The two do not match. (Note: This corrigenda was not published as a separate document, but was incorporated into IEEE Std 1735-2014)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
